reviews.text: Absolutely love this place - the burgers are amazing and the atmosphere is so cozy and inviting!
reviews.author: Chad G.P., Teah

reviews.text: The street food here is authentic and delicious. The dabeli and pav bhaji transport me straight back to Mumbai!
reviews.author: Priya S., Bangalore

reviews.text: Best homemade biscotti I've ever had! The dark chocolate brownie is to die for.
reviews.author: Meera R., HSR Layout

reviews.text: Such attention to detail in every dish. The monthly subscription is worth every penny!
reviews.author: Rahul K., Koramangala

reviews.text: Their baked goods are consistently excellent. The cupcakes are my weekend treat!
reviews.author: Sarah M., Indiranagar
